title: Facebook Ads Media Buyer (Meta)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a detail-obsessed, data-driven Media Buyer to help scale a rapidly growing brand.
This is a part-time role to start, focused initially on launching Meta (Facebook & Instagram) ads. If you're hungry, proactive, and thrive on improving performance through data, this will grow into a full-time position where you’ll take ownership of analyzing and optimizing campaigns.

? What You’ll Start Doing:
Launch ad sets using our simple 3:2:2 method via Upgrade to see actual info (a powerful ad automation tool we love).

Schedule and manage ads inside our one-CBO-per-country structure — nothing complicated here.

Execute instructions precisely and consistently — we don’t change strategies often, so reliability is key.

???? What This Can Grow Into:
If you’re the right fit, you'll transition into a full media buying role, where you'll:

Dive deep into metrics like conversion rate, hook rate, hold rate, and more.

Identify what’s working and what’s not — and share actionable insights with the team.

Help drive iteration and creative testing decisions.

???? Who We're Looking For:
Some experience with Meta ads is preferred — but being amazing with data and attention to detail is non-negotiable.

High-accuracy thinker: You catch inconsistencies, double-check your work, and never skip over the small stuff.

Proactive learner who wants to become world-class at media buying, even if you’re still early in your career.

Not afraid of feedback and holds themselves to a high standard.

???? If you often make sloppy mistakes or skip over details, please do not apply. You won’t enjoy this job (and I won’t enjoy working with you).

? If you're the type who triple-checks your work and takes pride in accuracy, you'll love working here — and I’ll do everything I can to help you grow.

???? Bonus Opportunity (Optional):
After a few months in the account, you'll also have the chance to contribute as a creative strategist.
If any ad ideas you come up with turn into winning ads, we’ll pay you a $250/month bonus per ad that scales.

E.g. You create 2 new winners = $500 extra/month.
(Again — this is optional, and not part of the core job description.)

???? Why Join Us?
We’re growing fast, and we keep things simple and effective.

You’ll work directly with the founder (that’s me — I’ve done all the media buying so far).

We reward performance, attention to detail, and initiative.

???? Summary:
Job Type: Part-Time (with potential for Full-Time)

Role: Meta Ads Media Buyer

Tools: Upgrade to see actual info, Meta Ads Manager

Start: ASAP

Skills Needed: Meta Ads (basic), Data Analysis, High Attention to Detail

If you're hungry, detail-obsessed, and eager to grow, I’d love to hear from you.
Tell me why you'd be a great fit — and include your favorite campaign or stat you've worked on (if you have one).

Let’s scale this together ????
